full_description:
Western Digital 2TB Blue 7200RPM Desktop HDD

The Western Digital 2TB Blue 7200RPM HDD offers the features and entry-level capacities that are ideal for your computing needs. It is ideal for use as a primary drive in desktop PCs and for office applications. It features NoTouch Ramp Load technology. The recording head never touches the disk media, ensuring significantly less wear to the recording head and media as well as better drive protection in transit. The state-of-the-art seeking algorithms and advanced power management feature ensure low power consumption. With the Western Digital 2TB Blue 7200RPM Desktop HDD upgrading your drive is easy. You can seamlessly migrate your current system to your new Western Digital drive using Acronis True Image WD Edition software, available as a free download on the Western Digital Support site. This software enables you to copy all your data to a new drive so you don't have to reinstall your operating system to get all the benefits of a new drive. Each new product goes through 600,000 hours of testing. The Western Digital 2TB Blue 7200RPM HDD comes with 2 years of warranty.

title: Western Digital 4TB Purple Surveillance HDD
cat_seo_title: Western Digital Hard Disk Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Western Digital external & internal HDD at best price in BD. Keep your data safe & secure by using WD HDD. Order online, visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
Western Digital 4TB Purple Surveillance HDD

Superior storage & Superior surveillance:

WD Purple drives are built for 24/7, always-on, high-definition security systems. With support for up to 8 hard drives and 32 cameras, WD Purple drives are optimized for surveillance. WD Purple surveillance storage also comes with WD's exclusive AllFrame technology, so you can confidently create a security system tailored to the needs of your business. Using AllFrame technology, WD Purple drives improve ATA streaming to reduce errors, pixilation, and video interruptions that happen when the wrong drive is used in your video recorder system.

Expand your view to 32:

WD Purple drives are optimized to support up to 32 HD cameras. With so many options, you have the flexibility to upgrade or expand your security system in the future.

The right drive for the right job:

WD Purple drives have been engineered specifically for surveillance, so they're able to withstand the extreme heat fluctuations and equipment vibrations within an DVR environment. An average desktop drive is built to run for only short intervals, not the harsh 24/7 always-on environment of a high-definition surveillance system. A disruption to a drive could result in a failure that impacts multiple users, your security archive, or even the entire system. With WD Purple, you get reliable, surveillance-class storage that's tested for compatibility in a wide-range of security systems.

Industry-leading storage:

WD is a worldwide leader in the hard drive industry. With WD Purple surveillance storage, you have a drive engineered for high temperature, always-on surveillance systems so you can rely on quality video playback when you need it most. Whether you're protecting loved ones or monitoring your business, WD Purple offers performance you can trust.

Trusted engineering

Built to WD's highest standards of quality and reliability, WD Blue offers the features and entry-level capacities that are ideal for your computing needs. WD Blue is designed by the brand that you trust with the quality you would expect for a tested, proven, everyday storage solution.

A modern classic

WD Blue storage is designed and manufactured with technology found in WD's original award-winning desktop and mobile hard drives. WD Blue sets the baseline for everyday storage by consistently delivering improved performance over previous generations while successfully maintaining WD's quality and reliability for over six generations. The difference is that our colors never fade, generation after generation.

Your power of choice

WD Blue is available in a broad range of entry-level capacities, cache sizes, form factors and interfaces so you can be sure there's a drive that's the perfect fit for your system. However, not all hard drives are created equally and for your applications that demand more, WD gives you the power of choice.

Drive with confidence

We perform tests on hundreds of systems, configurations, and a multitude of platforms in our FIT Lab to give our customers the confidence that our drives will work in their systems for the ultimate compatibility. WD Blue allows you to use our drive with confidence, knowing that our storage advancements such as NoTouch Ramp Load technology are proven and reliable everyday solutions.

Easy upgrade

Acronis True Image, available as a download on the WD Support website, enables you to copy all your data to a new drive so you don't have to reinstall your operating system to get all the benefits of a new

SATA or PATA, the choice is yours

While SATA has become the industry standard interface, WD continues to manufacture desktop drives with a PATA interface for unique or legacy systems.

full_description:
Western Digital Purple 6TB 3.5" Surveillance HDD

The Western Digital Purple 6TB 3.5" Surveillance HDD is a storage solution designed specifically for the high needs of 24/7 surveillance systems. With a 6TB capacity in a 3.5-inch form size and a SATA interface, this drive provides not only ample storage but also easy compatibility with a wide range of security applications. Western Digital, a hard drive industry leader, designed the WD Purple series to thrive in high-temperature settings, enabling consistent and high-quality video playback where dependability is critical. The drive supports a remarkable workload rate of up to 180TB per year, making it an excellent choice for high-definition surveillance systems. The scalability component is remarkable, with support for up to 64 cameras, allowing customers to grow and modify their surveillance arrangement to meet unique demands. These drives are tailored for Deep Learning analytics in AI-enabled NVRs, with a workload rating of up to 360TB per year, demonstrating their appropriateness for cutting-edge surveillance applications. The WD Purple 6TB Surveillance HDD not only works with a wide selection of industry-leading enclosures and chipsets, but it also prioritizes power economy in high-temperature, always-on surveillance situations. The use of Intelliseek Technology considerably decreases detrimental ambient noise and vibrations, resulting in decreased power consumption and increased longevity. The WD Purple Hard drive is highly versatile, fitting smoothly into both DVR and NVR security systems. Its interoperability extends to a variety of surveillance and security manufacturers, ensuring that customers will discover the ideal storage option for their specific system requirements. The Western Digital Purple 6TB 3.5" Surveillance HDD is a comprehensive and dependable storage solution that provides not just large capacity but also a package of capabilities designed to meet the stringent requirements of modern surveillance applications. Whether employed in standalone systems or as part of a wider security architecture, this drive provides the performance and endurance required for the most demanding surveillance applications.
